alert.note: Alert for Sierra Madre Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 2:44PM MDT until March 25 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO 6 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches, with locally higher amounts above 9,000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Sierra Madre Range. * WHEN...From noon Friday to 6 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
